sentences: Sa pead seda panema kõigepealt järjekorda.
context: The Estonian word 'panema' is a verb that means to put, place, or set something somewhere. It's one of the most common and versatile verbs in Estonian used for indicating physical placement of objects. The verb belongs to the -ma infinitive class and follows regular conjugation patterns in present tense. It can be used with various prepositions and case markers to indicate direction, location, or purpose.
